segments.text: Come on ! I'll pay you back on Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Last time I lent you money , you never paid me back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I promise if you lend me five dollars today , I will repay you in full next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , but I'm taking your skateboard as collateral .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine ! I can't believe you don't trust me .
segments.speaker: S1
